scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../phonebook-app/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy: heroku git:remote -a ew-fso-phonebook && cd ../ && git subtree push --prefix phonebook-backend heroku main
scripts.deploy:full: npm run setconfig && npm run build:ui && cd ../ && git add phonebook-backend && git commit -m uibuild && git push && cd phonebook-backend && npm run deploy
